title: Helm.ai releases new architectural framework for autonomous vehicles
description:
Helm.ai said the architecture enables automakers to deploy ADAS through L4 capabilities using their existing development fleets.

The post Helm.ai releases new architectural framework for autonomous vehicles appeared first on The Robot Report.
